ResearchProjectDef.label: longbow
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft longbows, a neolithic equivalent to the sniper rifle.

ResearchProjectDef.label: crossbow
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct crossbows, a medieval ranged weapon effective against armored enemies.

ResearchProjectDef.label: compound bow
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct compound bows, which use industrial-era components to silently fire arrows with greater efficiency.

ResearchProjectDef.label: tools
ResearchProjectDef.description: Smith worker's tools to assist with manual labor.

ResearchProjectDef.label: gunpowder
ResearchProjectDef.description: Synthesize gunpowder, the earliest known chemical explosive.

ResearchProjectDef.label: trench warfare
ResearchProjectDef.description: Adapt a trench warfare doctrine with a selection of weapons for close-quarters combat.

ResearchProjectDef.label: heavy weapons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct heavy weapons that offer superior firepower, at the cost of being very physically demanding.

ResearchProjectDef.label: flamethrower
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct flamethrowers, weapons that project a long, controllable stream of fire. Their lethality has lead to bans on many civilized worlds.

ResearchProjectDef.label: specialized firearms
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft specialized guns for demanding combat scenarios.

ResearchProjectDef.label: marksman rifle
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct semi-automatic marksman rifles, for use in long-distance engagements.

ResearchProjectDef.label: tactical grenades
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft specialized grenades, useful in a variety of engagements.

ResearchProjectDef.label: laser targeting systems
ResearchProjectDef.description: Adapt laser targeting systems for accurate and swift delivery of charged warheads.

ResearchProjectDef.label: orbital support
ResearchProjectDef.description: Connect to a network of orbital destruction satellites in order to craft orbital bombardment grenades.
